title: Politicized Rantings on Two Blogs by a ‘daviddepape’ Draw Scrutiny
description: The San Francisco district attorney is investigating hateful comments.
dc:creator: Charlie Savage, Alan Feuer and Kellen Browning
media:description: Paul Pelosi in Washington in 2020. Mr. Pelosi’s wife, Speaker Nancy Pelosi, has often been a target of anger from opposing political parties throughout her career.
